text: int maxab ( int a , int b ) { return a > b ? a : b ; } int main ( ) { int r , m , c , i , j ; int s [ 100 ] [ 101 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & c ) ; while ( c -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & s [ 0 ] [ 1 ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { s [ i - 1 ] [ 0 ] = 0 ; s [ i - 1 ] [ i + 1 ] = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & s [ i ] [ j ] ) ; s [ i ] [ j ] += maxab ( s [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] , s [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; } } m = s [ r - 1 ] [ 1 ] ; for ( i = 2 ; i <= r ; i ++ ) m = maxab ( m , s [ r - 1 ] [ i ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , m ) ; } return 0 ; }
